question: Which of the following portals has been launched to help startups get various licenses and approvals in an easy manner?
explanation: TAMRA stands for Transparency, Auction Monitoring and Resource Augmentation.TAMRA portal has been launched by the Ministry of Mines to enhance transparency and accountability as a part of the Ease of Doing Business in the Mining sector. It covers block-wise, state-wise and mineral-wise information of the blocks to be auctioned, monitors various statutory clearances, and also highlights the additional resources generated through e-Auction. eBiz portal has been launched by the Ministry of Commerce & Industry that helps the Indian startups to get various licenses and approvals hassle free. e-RaKAM aims to provide a platform to sell agricultural produce. It has been launched jointly by the by state-run-auctioneer MSTC and Central Warehousing Corporation arm CRWC. “e-nivaran” is a facility for online redressal of taxpayers' grievances related to refunds.
